source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 中国共产党是中国工人阶级的先锋队，同时是中国人民和中华民族的先锋队，是中国特色社会主义事业的领导核心。
translations.en: The Communist Party of China is the vanguard of the Chinese working class; at the same time, it is the vanguard of the Chinese people, and the Chinese nation. It is the leadership core for the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics.

source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 中国共产党始终把为中国人民谋幸福、为中华民族谋复兴作为自己的初心使命，始终坚持共产主义理想和社会主义信念，团结带领全国各族人民为争取民族独立、人民解放和实现国家富强、人民幸福而不懈奋斗。
translations.en: The Communist Party of China (CPC) has remained true to its original aspiration and founding mission of seeking happiness for the Chinese people and rejuvenation for the Chinese nation. Staying committed to communist ideals and socialist convictions, it has united and led the Chinese people

source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 一百年前，中国共产党的成立，是中华民族伟大复兴史上开天辟地的大事变。
translations.en: One hundred years ago, the Communist Party of China was founded, marking a seminal, ground-breaking event in the history of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 在近代中国社会矛盾的剧烈冲突中，在中国人民反抗封建统治和外来侵略的激烈斗争中，在马克思列宁主义同中国工人运动的紧密结合中，1921年7月中国共产党应运而生。
translations.en: With the advent of modern times, Chinese society became embroiled in intense upheavals; this was a time of fierce struggle as the Chinese people resisted feudal rule and foreign aggression. It was in the midst of this, in July 1921, as Marxism-Leninism was deeply integrated with the Chinese workers'movement, that the Communist Party of China was born.

source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 从此，中国人民谋求民族独立、人民解放和国家富强、人民幸福的斗争就有了主心骨、领路人，中国人民就从精神上由被动转为主动，中华民族开始艰难地但不可逆转地走向伟大复兴。
translations.en: From that moment on, the Chinese people have had in the Party a backbone and path-leader for their pursuit of national independence and liberation, of a stronger and more prosperous country,and of their own happiness; and the mindset of the Chinese people has changed, from passivity to taking the initiative,and the Chinese nation has,painstakingly yet unstoppably,embarked on a journey toward great rejuvenation.

source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 一百年来，党领导人民浴血奋战、百折不挠，创造了新民主主义革命的伟大成就；自力更生、发愤图强，创造了社会主义革命和建设的伟大成就；解放思想、锐意进取，创造了改革开放和社会主义现代化建设的伟大成就；自信自强、守正创新，创造了新时代中国特色社会主义的伟大成就。
translations.en: Over the past hundred years, the Party has led the people to a number of important milestones: achieving great success in the new-democratic revolution through fierce battles and unyielding struggles; achieving great success in socialist revolution and construction through self-reliance and a determination to build a stronger China; achieving great success in reform, opening-up, and socialist modernization by freeing minds and forging ahead; and achieving great success for socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era through self-confidence, self-reliance, and innovation on the basis of what has worked in the past.

source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 党和人民百年奋斗，书写了中华民族几千年历史上最恢宏的史诗。
translations.en: These endeavors of the Party and the people over the past century represent the most magnificent chapter in the millennia-long history of the Chinese nation.

source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 中国的面貌、中华民族的面貌、中国人民的面貌焕然一新，社会主义中国巍然屹立在世界东方。
translations.en: China, the Chinese nation and the Chinese people have changed in ways without precedent,and socialist China now stands talland firm in the East.

source.title_zh: 前言
source.title_en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 展览以“不忘初心、牢记使命”为主题，全景式展现中国共产党团结带领中国人民铸就百年辉煌的不懈奋斗、不怕牺牲、理论探索、为民造福、自身建设的壮阔历程，用党的奋斗历程和伟大成就鼓舞斗志、明确方向，用党的光荣传统和优良作风坚定信念、凝聚力量，用党的实践创造和历史经验启迪智慧、砥砺品格，引导人们深刻认识红色政权来之不易、新中国来之不易、中国特色社会主义来之不易，深刻认识中国共产党为什么能、马克思主义为什么行、中国特色社会主义为什么好，激励广大干部群众以昂扬姿态满怀信心投身全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程。
translations.en: This exhibition, under the theme of "Remaining True to Our Original Aspiration and Keeping Our Founding Mission Firmly in Mind", offers a panoramic view of the extraordinary journey of the CPC that has rallied and led the Chinese people to the one hundred years of for China. It will motivate all our officials and the general public to join, with great enterprise and full confidence, the new journey to build China into a modern socialist country in all respects.

source.title_zh: 第一部分
source.title_en: PART 1

translations.zh: 建立中国共产党 夺取新民主主义革命伟大胜利
translations.en: Founding the Communist Party of China Winning the Great Victory of the New Democratic Revolution

translations.zh: 第三单元在大革命的洪流中中国共产党成立后，集中力量领导工人运动和农民运动，推进并帮助国民党改组和国民革命军建立，实现第一次国共合作，领导全国反帝反封建伟大斗争，掀起大革命高潮。
translations.en: SECTION III The Surging Tide of the Great Revolution After its founding, the CPC pooled its strength on leading the workers' movement and the peasants' movement, promoted and supported the reorganization of the Chinese Kuomintang (KMT) and the founding of the National Revolutionary Army, enabled the first KMT-CPC cooperation, and led the great anti-imperialist and anti-feudal struggle across the country, bringing about a surge in the Great Revolution.

translations.zh: 由于国民党内反动集团叛变革命和党的领导机关犯了右倾机会主义错误，大革命失败。
translations.en: Due to the betrayal of the revolution by the reactionary clique within the KMT and the Right opportunistmistakes by the Party's leading body, the Great Revolution failed.

translations.zh: 中国共产党轰轰烈烈的革命工作，在中国革命史上写下了光辉的一页，为党领导人民把革命斗争推向新的阶段准备了条件。
translations.en: The revolutionary endeavor of the CPC left a glorious page in the history of the Chinese revolution, and provided the condition for the Party to lead the people in taking the revolutionary struggle to a new stage.

translations.zh: 土地革命战争开辟农村包围城市道路大革命失败后，中国共产党独立高举武装革命旗帜领导中国人民进行土地革命战争，创建红军和农村革命根据地，开辟了农村包围城市、武装夺取政权的正确革命道路。
translations.en: SECTION IV The Agrarian Revolutionary War Opening a Path of Encircling Cities from the Countryside After the failure of the Great Revolution, the CPC held high the banner of armed revolution independently, and led the Chinese people in waging the Agrarian Revolutionary War, founding the Red Army and rural revolutionary base areas, and blazing a right path of revolution, one of encircling the cities from the countryside and seizing political power through armed struggle.

translations.zh: 由于“左”倾教条主义在党内的错误领导，革命事业遭受重大挫折，红军被迫长征。
translations.en: Due to the misguided leadership of “Left” dogmatism within the Party, the revolutionary cause suffered severe setbacks, and the Red Army was compelled to start the Long March.

translations.zh: 经过遵义会议，中国共产党实现了伟大转折。
translations.en: Through the Zunyi Meeting, the CPC realized a great turn in its history.

translations.zh: 在党中央和毛泽东的正确领导下，红军最终取得长征的伟大胜利。
translations.en: Under the correct leadership of the CPC Central Committee and Mao Zedong, the Red Army ultimately achieved great victory of the Long March.

translations.zh: 1931年九一八事变后，抗战爆发，中国共产党率先高举武装抗日旗帜，并将中国人民革命斗争推向全民族抗日战争的新阶段。
translations.en: After the September 18th Incident of 1931, the war of resistance erupted. The CPC was the first to propose that China should fight Japanese aggression with armed resistance, and advanced the Chinese people's revolutionary struggle to a new stage of the entire nation's war of resistance against Japanese aggression.

source.title_zh: 第五单元 全民族抗日战争的中流砥柱
source.title_en: SECTION V Pillar of the Entire Nation's War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression

translations.zh: 中国共产党努力实现国共合作为基础的抗日民族统一战线，坚持全面抗战路线，提出和实施持久战的战略总方针和一整套人民战争的战略战术，领导人民军队开展敌后游击战争，建立和发展抗日民主根据地。
translations.en: The CPC worked earnestly to forge the Chinese united front against Japanese aggression on the basis of KMT-CPC cooperation, and adhered to the line of all-out resistance. It devised and executed strategic guidelines for a protracted war as well as a whole set of strategies and tactics for a people's war.The Party led the people's army in conducting guerrilla warfare behind enemy lines, and established and developed democratic base areas of resisting Japanese aggression.

source.title_zh: 第五单元 全民族抗日战争的中流砥柱
source.title_en: SECTION V Pillar of the Entire Nation's War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression

translations.zh: 坚持统一战线中的独立自主原则，实行发展进步势力、争取中间势力、孤立顽固势力，坚持抗战反对妥协、坚持团结反对分裂、坚持进步反对倒退的方针。
translations.en: It upheld the principle of maintaining independence and initiative within the United Front, and implemented the policy of developing progressive forces, winning over forces taking middle ground and isolating die-hard elements, and the policy of continuing the war of resistance and opposing compromise,upholding unity and opposing split, and standing for progress and opposing retrogression.

source.title_zh: 第五单元 全民族抗日战争的中流砥柱
source.title_en: SECTION V Pillar of the Entire Nation's War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression

translations.zh: 大力推进党的建设，确定毛泽东思想为党的指导思想。
translations.en: Major efforts were made to advance Party building, and Mao Zedong Thought was identified as the Party's guiding thought.

source.title_zh: 第五单元 全民族抗日战争的中流砥柱
source.title_en: SECTION V Pillar of the Entire Nation's War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression

translations.zh: 中国共产党成为全民族抗战的中流砥柱，直到取得中国人民抗日战争最后胜利。
translations.en: The CPC stood as the pillar in the entire nation's resistance until the Chinese people finally prevailed.

source.title_zh: 第五单元 全民族抗日战争的中流砥柱
source.title_en: SECTION V Pillar of the Entire Nation's War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression

translations.zh: 这是近代以来中国人民反抗外敌入侵第一次取得完全胜利的民族解放斗争，也是世界反法西斯战争胜利的重要组成部分。
translations.en: This marked the first time in modern history that the Chinese people had won a complete victory against foreign aggressors in the war of national liberation, and was an important part of the global war against fascism.

source.title_zh: 第六单元 解放战争的胜利 筹建新中国
source.title_en: SECTION VI Victory of the War of Liberation Preparation for the Founding of a New China

translations.zh: 抗日战争胜利后，中国共产党代表中国人民的根本利益，为争取和平民主作出巨大努力。
translations.en: Following the victory of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression, the CPC, representing the fundamental interests of the Chinese people, made tremendous efforts for peace and democracy.

source.title_zh: 第六单元 解放战争的胜利 筹建新中国
source.title_en: SECTION VI Victory of the War of Liberation Preparation for the Founding of a New China

translations.zh: 国民党挑起内战，中国共产党领导解放区军民坚决以自卫战争粉碎国民党军队的进攻，并积极推动国民党统治区的人民民主运动。
translations.en: After the KMT instigated the civil war, the CPC led the army and people of the liberated areas in defeating KMT offensives through resolute war of self-defense and actively promoted people's democratic movements in KMT-controlled areas.

source.title_zh: 第六单元 解放战争的胜利 筹建新中国
source.title_en: SECTION VI Victory of the War of Liberation Preparation for the Founding of a New China

translations.zh: 随着形势发展，中国共产党指挥人民解放军转入战略进攻，经过战略决战和战略追击，推翻国民党反动统治，夺取新民主主义革命胜利，筹建新中国，基本完成民族独立和人民解放的历史任务。
translations.en: As the situation evolved, the CPC commanded the People's Liberation Army (PLA) to move into strategic offensive, wage strategically decisive battles and stage strategic pursuit of the KMT forces. The reactionary KMT rule was overthrown, the victory of the new-democratic revolution was won, and preparation was made for the founding of a new China. Thus the historical task of achieving national independence and the people's liberation was basically accomplished.

source.title_zh: 第一单元
source.title_en: SECTION I

translations.zh: 新中国建设的全面展开社会主义制度的建立新中国成立后，中国共产党领导全国人民面对西方敌对势力的孤立、遏制、包围和威胁，为巩固人民民主政权而斗争，经过七年的努力，完成土地改革和社会各方面民主改革任务，赢得抗美援朝战争伟大胜利，迅速恢复国民经济，提出过渡时期总路线，基本完成对生产资料私有制的社会主义改造，建立起社会主义经济制度，确立人民代表大会制度、中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商制度、民族区域自治制度。
translations.en: Starting All-Round Construction in the People's Republic Establishing the Socialist System After the founding of the People's Republic of China, in the face of isolation, containment, encirclement and threats of hostile Western forces, the CPC led the After seven years of hard work, the agrarian reform and democratic reforms in all sectors of society were completed, and the resounding victory in the War to Resist Us general line for the transition period was adopted, the socialist transformation of private ownership of the means of production was basically completed, thus the socialist economic system was established.The system of people's congresses,the system of CPC-led multiparty cooperation and political consultation, and the system of regional ethnic autonomy were also established.

source.title_zh: 第一单元
source.title_en: SECTION I

translations.zh: 社会主义制度的建立，为我国一切进步和发展奠定了重要基础。
translations.en: Taken together, the establishment of the socialist system laid the very foundation for all of China's progress and development in the years to come

translations.zh: 成功开创中国特色社会主义党的十一届三中全会以后，以邓小平同志为主要代表的中国共产党人，团结带领全党全国各族人民，深刻总结新中国成立以来正反两方面经验，围绕什么是社会主义、怎样建设社会主义这一根本问题，借鉴世界社会主义历史经验，创立了邓小平理论，解放思想，实事求是，作出把党和国家工作中心转移到经济建设上来、实行改革开放的历史性决策，深刻揭示社会主义本质，确立社会主义初级阶段基本路线，明确提出走自己的路、建设中国特色社会主义，科学回答了建设中国特色社会主义的一系列基本问题，制定了到21世纪中叶分三步走、基本实现社会主义现代化的发展战略，成功开创了中国特色社会主义。
translations.en: Successfully Founding Socialism with Chinese Characteristics After the third plenary session of the 11th Party Central Committee, Chinese communists,with Comrade Deng Xiaoping as their chief representative,united and led Republic. On this basis,and by addressing the fundamental issues of what socialism is and how to build it and by drawing lessons from the history of world socialism, they established Deng Xiaoping Theory.They endeavored to free people's minds and seek truth from facts. A historic decision was made to shift the focus of the Party and the country's work agenda onto economic development and to launch the reform and opening-up drive.Chinese communists made known the essence of socialism, set the basic line for the primary stage of socialism, and declared that China would follow its own path and build socialism with Chinese characteristics. They provided sound socialism with Chinese a series of basic questions on building to answers and formulated a three-step development strategy for basically achieving socialist modernization by the middle of the 21st century. They thus succeeded in founding socialism with Chinese characteristics

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 2024年12月，北京市组织开展“北京抗日战争主题片区”保护提升工作。
translations.en: In December 2024, Beijing initiated the preservation and enhancement project for the “War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing."

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: “北京抗日战争主题片区”主要包括北京地区与抗日战争有关的重要纪念场馆、重大历史事件发生地、烈士纪念场所等纪念设施、遗址。
translations.en: This area mainly encompasses significant memorials, major historical event sites, martyr memorial sites, and other commemorative facilities and relics related to the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression in Beijing.

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 宛平城位于北京市丰台区卢沟桥东侧，始建于明崇祯十三年（1638年）。
translations.en: WANPING FORTRESS Wanping Fortress, standing on the east bank of Lugou Bridge in Fengtai District, Beijing, was first built in the 13th year of the Chongzhen reign of the Ming Dynasty (1638).

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 原名拱北城，清改称拱极城，是拱卫京畿的桥头堡。
translations.en: It served as a bridgehead guarding the capital.

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 1928年宛平县公署迁至拱极城，并将其改名宛平城。
translations.en: In 1928, when the Wanping County Government relocated here, it assumed its present name.

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 宛平城东西长640米，南北宽320米，总面积约20公顷。
translations.en: The fortress measures 640 m east-west and 320 m north-south, covering an area of about 20 ha.

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 1937年7月7日，日本侵略者蓄意制造七七事变，炮轰宛平城，攻击卢沟桥，当地中国驻军第29军奋起抵抗，全民族抗战由此爆发。
translations.en: On July 7, 1937, the Japanese invaders deliberately engineered the July 7th Incident, bombarding Wanping Fortress and assaulting Lugou Bridge; the local garrison, the 29th Corps of the Chinese Army, rose up to resist, and the whole-nation resistance war against Japanese aggression thus broke out.

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 现城墙上仍留存有31处弹坑。
translations.en: 31 shell craters remain visible on the ramparts today.

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 宛平城作为全民族抗战爆发纪念地，是北京抗日战争主题片区核心区重要组成部分，第一批全国重点文物保护单位，第一批国家级抗战纪念设施、遗址，2021年列入北京市第一批不可移动革命文物名录。
translations.en: As the commemorative site marking the outbreak of that war, Wanping Fortress is a key component of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing, one of the first List of Key National Cultural Relics Protection Units, and one of the first batch of national-level memorial facilities and sites for the Resistance Against Japanese Aggression. In 2021, it was included in the first List of Beijing's Immovable Revolutionary Cultural Relics.

source.title_zh: 北京抗日战争主题片区主要纪念设施、遗址
source.title_en: Major Memorial Facilities and Relics of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing

translations.zh: 中共北京市委宣传部二〇二五年六月
translations.en: Publicity Department of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China June, 2025

translations.zh: 2024年12月，北京市组织开展“北京抗日战争主题片区”保护提升工作。
translations.en: Major Memorial Facilities In December 2024, Beijing initiated the preservation and enhancement project for the “War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing."

translations.zh: “北京抗日战争主题片区”主要包括北京地区与抗日战争有关的重要纪念场馆、重大历史事件发生地、烈士纪念场所等纪念设施、遗址。
translations.en: This area mainly encompasses significant memorials, major historical event sites, martyr memorial sites, and other commemorative facilities and relics related to the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression in Beijing.

translations.zh: 卢沟桥卢沟桥位于北京市丰台区，始建于金大定二十九年（1189年），是北京现存最古老的联拱石桥，因横跨卢沟河（即永定河）而得名。
translations.en: LUGOU  BRIDGE LUGOUBRIDGE Lugou Bridge, located in Fengtai District, Beijing, was first built in the 29th year of the Dading reign of the Jin Dynasty (1189). As the oldest surviving multi-arch stone bridge in Beijing, it takes its name from the Lugou River--today' s Yong- ding River-over which it spans.

translations.zh: 桥长266.5米，宽9.3米，桥上现存雕刻精美、形态各异的大小石狮共计501只。
translations.en: The bridge is 266.5 m long and 9.3 m wide, with 501 finely carved stone lions of varied poses on its balustrades.

translations.zh: 1937年7月7日，日本侵略者蓄意制造七七事变，炮轰宛平城，攻击卢沟桥，当地中国驻军第29军奋起抵抗，全民族抗战由此爆发。
translations.en: On July 7, 1937, the Japanese invaders deliberately engineered the July 7th Incident, bombarding Wanping Fortress and assaulting Lugou Bridge; the local garrison - the 29th Corps of the Chinese Army, rose up to resist, and the whole-nation resistance war against Japanese aggression thus broke out.

translations.zh: 卢沟桥作为全民族抗战爆发纪念地，是北京抗日战争主题片区核心区重要组成部分，第一批全国重点文物保护单位，第一批国家级抗战纪念设施、遗址，2021年列入北京市第一批不可移动革命文物名录。
translations.en: As the commemorative site marking the outbreak of that war, Lugou Bridge is a key component of the War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression Themed Area in Beijing, one of the first List of Key National Cultural Relics Protection Units and one of the first batch of national-level memorial facilities and sites for the Resistance Against Japanese Aggression. In 2021, it was included in the first List of Beijing's Immovable Revolutionary Cultural Relics.

translations.zh: 1921年7月，中国共产党应运而生。
translations.en: In July 1921, the Communist Party of China was born.

translations.zh: 新民主主义革命时期，党面临的主要任务是，反对帝国主义、封建主义、官僚资本主义，争取民族独立、人民解放，为实现中华民族伟大复兴创造根本社会条件。
translations.en: In the period of the new-democratic and bureaucrat-capitalism, seek national independence and the people's liberation, and create the fundamental social conditions necessary for realizing national rejuvenation.

source.title_zh: 第三单元
source.title_en: SECTION II

translations.en: With the wide spread of Marxism in China and its close application to the Chinese workers' movement, the task of establishing a new type of political party of the working class was put on the agenda.

source.title_zh: 第三单元
source.title_en: SECTION II

source.title_zh: 第三单元
source.title_en: SECTION II

translations.zh: 自从有了中国共产党，灾难深重的中国人民有了主心骨和领航人，中国革命有了坚强的领导力量。
translations.en: Since the founding of the CPC, the Chinese people, after going through all their untold sufferings, have had a backbone and navigator, and the Chinese revolution has had a strong leading force

source.title_en: SECTION 1

translations.zh: 中华民族是世界上古老而伟大的民族，创造了绵延五千多年的灿烂文明，为人类文明进步作出了不可磨灭的贡献。
translations.en: With a history stretching back more than 5,000 years, the Chinese nation is a great and ancient nation that has fostered a splendid civilization and made indelible contributions to the progress of human civilization.

source.title_zh: 第一单元
source.title_en: SECTION 1

translations.zh: 1840年鸦片战争以后，由于西方列强入侵和封建统治腐败，中国逐步成为半殖民地半封建社会，国家蒙辱、人民蒙难、文明蒙尘，中华民族遭受了前所未有的劫难。
translations.en: After the Opium War of 1840, however, China was gradually reduced to a semi-colonial, semi-feudal society due to the aggression of Western powers and the corruption of feudal rulers.

source.title_zh: 第一单元
source.title_en: SECTION 1

translations.zh: 为了拯救民族危亡，中国人民奋起反抗，仁人志士奔走呐喊，进行了可歌可泣的斗争，但都以失败告终。
translations.en: To save the nation from peril, the Chinese people rose to fight back, and patriots of high ideals sought to pull the nation together, putting up heroic and moving struggle.

source.title_zh: 第一单元
source.title_en: SECTION 1

translations.zh: 中国迫切需要新的思想引领救亡运动，迫切需要新的组织凝聚革命力量。
translations.en: China was in urgent need of new ideas to lead the movement to save the nation and a new organization to rally forces of revolution.

translations.zh: 日本对中国的侵略蓄谋已久。
translations.en: Japan had long plotted to invade China.

translations.zh: 1868年明治维新后，日本迅速走上对外侵略扩张的军国主义道路，制定了以侵略中国等为主要目标的大陆政策，并使之成为日本军国主义对外侵略扩张、称霸世界的行动纲领。
translations.en: After the Meiji Restoration in 1868, Japan embarked on a militarist path of external expansion.

translations.zh: 此后，日本发动和参加了一系列侵华战争，最早成为世界东方的战争策源地。
translations.en: It formulated the Continental Policy aimed at annexing China and other countries, and regarded it as the action plan for Japanese militarists to seek outward expansion and dominate the world.Afterwards, Japan launched and participated in a series of wars to invade China, making itself the first hotbed of war in the East.

translations.zh: 第一部分奋起抵抗打响世界中国人民打响反法西斯战争第一枪。自近代以后，由于列强的入侵和封建统治的腐败，中国一步步成为半殖民地半封建社会。
translations.en: PART 1 The Chinese People Rose Up to Resist Japanese Aggression and Fired the First Shot in the World Anti-Fascist War. Since modern times, due to the invasion by foreign powers and the corruption of feudal rule, China was gradually reduced to a semi-colonial, semi-feudal society.

translations.en: Particularly, as a result of the barbaric aggression by Japanese militarists, the Chinese people stood on the brink of national extinction.

translations.en: In 1931, Japanese militarists audaciously launched the September 18th Incident, occupying the entire northeastern region of China.

translations.zh: 九一八事变后，中国人民就在白山黑水间奋起抵抗，成为中国人民抗日战争的起点，同时揭开了世界反法西斯战争的序幕。
translations.en: Following the incident, the Chinese people rose up to resist Japanese aggressors in Northeast China, heralding the beginning of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression and raising the curtain on the World Anti-Fascist War.

translations.en: The Communist Party of China (CPC) took the lead in raising the banner of armed resistance against Japanese aggression.

translations.en: In 1900, Japan participated as a major force in the Eight Allied Force's invasion of China.

translations.zh: 中国人民抗日战争，是中国人民反抗日本军国主义侵略的正义战争。
translations.en: INTRODUCTION

translations.zh: 从一九三一年到一九四五年，经过长达十四年艰苦卓绝的浴血奋战，中国人民打败了穷凶极恶的日本军国主义侵略者，取得了中国人民抗日战争的伟大胜利，宣告了世界反法西斯战争的完全胜利。
translations.en: invasion by Japanese militarists.

translations.zh: 中国人民抗日战争是近代以来中国人民反抗外敌入侵第一次取得完全胜利的民族解放斗争。
translations.en: After 14 years of tenacious and arduous struggle from 1931 to 1945, the Chinese people defeated the atrocious Japanese militarist invaders and won the great victory of their war of resistance against Japanese aggression, marking the complete victory of the World Anti-Fascist War.

translations.zh: 面对野蛮凶残的日本侵略者，在民族危亡的历史关头，中国共产党以卓越的政治领导力和正确的战略策略，指引中国抗战的前进方向，勇敢战斗在抗战最前线，支撑起中华民族救亡图存的希望，成为全民族抗战的中流砥柱、夺取战争胜利的民族先锋。
translations.en: The Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression was the first time in modern history that the Chinese people had won a complete victory against foreign aggressors in the war of national liberation.

translations.zh: 在中国共产党倡导建立的抗日民族统一战线旗帜下，全体中华儿女同仇敌忾、众志成城，为国家生存而战、为民族复兴而战、为人类正义而战，谱写了惊天地、泣鬼神的雄壮史诗。
translations.en: Facing the invasion by brutal Japanese militarists, the Communist Party of China (CPC) demonstrated outstanding political leadership and formulated correct strategic policies, guiding China's War of Resistance toward victory at the critical historical juncture of national survival.

translations.zh: 中国人民抗日战争是世界反法西斯战争的重要组成部分。
translations.en: The Party bravely fought on the frontline, sustaining hope for saving the Chinese nation from subjugation.

translations.zh: 在世界反法西斯战争中，中国人民抗日战争开始时间最早、持续时间最长，中国人民以巨大民族牺牲支撑起世界反法西斯战争的东方主战场，为世界反法西斯战争胜利作出了重大贡献。
translations.en: It became the central pillar of the total resistance against Japanese aggression by the whole nation, serving as the vanguard in securing victory in the War of Resistance.

translations.zh: 中国人民抗日战争的伟大胜利，为中华民族从近代以来陷入深重危机走向伟大复兴确立了历史转折点，对人类和平与发展的崇高事业产生了深远影响，将永远铭刻在中华民族史册上，永远铭刻在人类正义事业史册上！

translations.zh: 中国军队在广大爱国民众支持和声援下，相继进行长城抗战、察哈尔抗战和绥远抗战，延缓了日军对华北的进犯。
translations.en: With the support from the patriotic public, the Chinese army consecutively carried out defensive battles at the Great Wall, Chahar, and Suiyuan, slowing down the Japanese invasion of North China.

translations.zh: 中国共产党领导的一二九运动，极大地促进了中华民族的觉醒，标志着中国人民抗日救亡运动新高潮的到来。
translations.en: The December 9th Movement led by the CPC fully awakened the Chinese nation and heralded another zenith of the resistance and national salvation movement among the Chinese people.

translations.en: On May 26, 1933, under the influence and assistance of the Communist Party of China, the Chahar People's Resistance Allied Force was established in Zhangjiakou.

translations.en: On February 11, 1937, Song Tieyan, director of the Political Department of the First Corps of the First Route Army of the Northeast United Resistance Army, laid down his life for covering the main forces to break the enemy's besiegement.

translations.zh: 1936年11月25日，东北抗日联军第1路军副总司令兼2军军长王德泰率部抗日、伪军，在战斗中英勇牺牲。
translations.en: On November 25, 1936, Wang Detai, deputy commander-in-chief of the First Route Army of the Northeast United Resistance Army and commander of the Second Corps, led his troops to resist the Japanese and puppet forces, and valiantly sacrificed his life in the battle.

translations.zh: 1939年8月，东北抗日联军第1路军副总司令魏拯民率第1路军3方面军，攻打安图城，摧毁伪警察署，并全歼增援日军。
translations.en: In August 1939, Wei Zhengmin, deputy commander-in-chief of the First Route Army of the Northeast United Resistance Army, led the Third Front Army to attack the city of Antu and destroyed the puppet police station, completely annihilating the reinforcements of the Japanese army.

translations.zh: 1940年12月8日，东北抗日联军第1路军3方面军指挥陈翰章在突围战斗中壮烈牺牲。
translations.en: On December 8, 1940, Chen Hanzhang, commanding officer of the Third Front Army of the First Route Army of the Northeast United Resistance Army died heroically during the breakout battle.

translations.zh: 1939年，东北抗日联军第3路军在黑龙江北部十余个县境内坚持游击战争。
translations.en: In 1939, the Third Route Army of the Northeast United Resistance Army persisted in guerrilla warfare in the northern part of Heilongjiang Province.

translations.zh: 1937年底，东北抗日联军第2路军开始活动于艰苦的反“讨伐”作战。
translations.en: At the end of 1937, the Second Route Army of the Northeast United Resistance Army commenced arduous operations against the Japanese “expeditionary” forces.

translations.zh: 随着民族危机加深，中国共产党提出建立抗日民族统一战线的政策主张。
translations.en: As the national crisis deepened, the CPC proposed the establishment of the Chinese united front against Japanese aggression.

translations.zh: 1935年12月，瓦窑堡会议确定抗日民族统一战线的基本策略任务。
translations.en: In December 1935, the Wayaobu Meeting decided to establish as the fundamental strategic task the Chinese united front against Japanese aggression.

translations.zh: 1936年12月，西安事变的和平解决，成为时局转换的枢纽。
translations.en: In December 1936, the Xi'an Incident was peacefully settled, marking a pivotal turning point of the domestic situation at that time.

translations.zh: 中国共产党促成西安事变和平解决，对推动国共再次合作、团结抗日起了重大历史作用。
translations.en: The peaceful settlement of the incident, which was largely attributed to the contributions of the CPC, played a significant historic role in promoting the second KMT-CPC cooperation to resist Japanese aggression together.

translations.zh: 1935年12月下旬，在中国共产党的领导下，北平学联组织平津南下扩大宣传团。
translations.en: In late December 1935, the Beiping Student Union organized the Beiping-Tianjin Southward Expansion Publicity Group.

translations.zh: 图为宣传团在河北固安县进行抗日宣传。
translations.en: The picture shows the Publicity Group conducting resistance publicity in Gu'an County, Hebei.

translations.zh: 北平学生的爱国运动。

translations.zh: 1936年至1937年，北平学联和民先队在北平香山联合举办数次夏令营，指导爱国学生学习革命理论，进行军事训练。
translations.en: From 1936 to 1937, the Beiping Student Union and the Liberation Vanguard jointly organized several summer camps in the Fragrant Hills, Beiping.

translations.zh: 图为参加夏令营的学生在樱桃沟山石上刻下的“保卫华北”。
translations.en: The picture shows the phrase “Defend North China" carved on a rock by the students who participated in the summer camp at Yingtaogou.

translations.zh: 1936年5月，全国各界救国联合会在上海成立。
translations.en: In May 1936, the All-China Federation for Multi-Sector National Protection was established in Shanghai.

translations.zh: 图为全国各界救国联合会领导人沈钧儒、史良、王造时、沙千里（前排左起）等参加上海各界群众抗日示威游行。
translations.en: The image shows leaders of the federation participating in a mass demonstration for resistance against Japanese aggression in Shanghai.

translations.en: On June 15, 1935, the Central Government of the Chinese Soviet Republic and the Revolutionary Military Committee of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army issued the “Declaration Against Japan's Annexation of North China and Chiang Kai-shek's Betrayal of the Nation"

translations.zh: 第一单元全民族抗战爆发中国共产党倡导建立的抗日民族统战线正式形成
translations.en: Section 1 The Formation of the Chinese United Front Against Japanese Aggression Advocated by the CPC after the Onset of Nationwide Resistance

translations.zh: 1937年7月7日，日本侵略者为了达到以武力吞并全中国的罪恶野心，悍然炮轰宛平城，制造了震惊中外的卢沟桥事变。
translations.en: On July 7,1937,Japanese invaders bombarded the county seat of Wanping and staged the world-shaking Lugou Bridge Incident in an attempt to annex China by force.

translations.zh: 7月8日，中共中央发布《中国共产党为日军进攻卢沟桥通电》。
translations.en: On July 8, the CPC Central Committee published the Circular Telegram of the CPC on the Attack of Lugou Bridge by Japanese Corps.

translations.zh: 9月，《中共中央为公布国共合作宣言》发表，蒋介石发表实际上承认中国共产党合法地位的谈话，标志着以国共两党合作为基础的抗日民族统一战线正式形成。
translations.en: In September, the Declaration of the CPC Central Committee on the KMT-CPC Cooperation was issued, and Chiang Kai-shek delivered a speech in which he de facto recognized the legality of the CPC, marking the formation of KMT-CPC cooperation.

translations.zh: 全民族抗战开辟世界反法西斯战争东方主战场
translations.en: PART 2 China's Nationwide Resistance Against Japanese Aggression Opened the Main Eastern Battlefield of the World Anti-Fascist War

translations.zh: 1937年，日本军国主义蓄意制造七七事变，发动全面侵华战争，中国军民对日本侵略者进行了顽强抵抗。
translations.en: In 1937, Japanese militarists instigated the July 7th Incident, marking the onset of an all-out invasion of China.

translations.zh: 中国由此进入全民族抗战阶段，并开辟了世界反法西斯战争的东方主战场。
translations.en: Chinese troops and civilians rose up to tenaciously resist Japanese aggressors.

translations.zh: 中国共产党秉持民族大义，担负起民族救亡的历史重任，推动以国共合作为基础的抗日民族统一战线正式形成。
translations.en: Thus, China entered the stage of nationwide resistance against Japanese aggression, and became the main Eastern battlefield of the World Anti-Fascist War.

translations.zh: 中国各党派、各民族、各阶级、各阶层、各团体以及海外华侨，同仇敌忾、众志成城，义无反顾投身到抗击日本侵略者的洪流之中。
translations.en: The collaboration between the center-stage battlefield and the back-stage battlefield forged a strategic situation to jointly resist Japanese invaders.

translations.zh: 务是建立广泛的抗日民族统一1935年12月27日，毛泽东在党的活动分子会议上作《论反对日本帝国主义的策略》的报告，充分论证了与民族资产阶级重新建立统一战线的可能性和重要性，并提出要打倒敌人必须准备作持久战。

translations.zh: 为以实际行动表示红军抗日决心，中共中央决1936年2月20日，中国人民红军抗日先锋军东渡黄河，开始东征。
translations.en: On February 20, 1936, the Chinese People's Red Army's Resistance Pioneers crossed the Yellow River and launched the Eastward Expedition campaign.

translations.zh: 红军的东征行动，遭到阎锡山部定中国工农红军第一方面军以中国人民红军抗日先锋军的顽抗。
translations.en: The image shows title of the Chinese People's Red Army's Resistance Pioneers.

translations.zh: 为了避免内战，保存抗日力量，并促进抗日民族统一战线工作的开展，5月初，中共中央决定锋军名义实行东征。
translations.en: a contingent of the cavalry of the Resistance Pioneers preparing to cross the Yellow River.

translations.zh: 洛川第二单元敌后战场和正面战场协力合作粉碎日军速战速决战得民众图谋前线用极
translations.en: The Luochuan Section 2 Resistance Coordinated Efforts Between the Backstage Battlefield and the Center Stage Battlefield Foiled Japan's Plan for a Quick Victory

translations.zh: 1937年8月，中共中央在陕北洛川召开政治局扩大会议，制定了全面抗战路线。
translations.en: In August 1937, the CPC Central Committee held an enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau in Luochuan, Shaanxi Province, where it formulated the policy of total resistance against Japanese aggression.

translations.zh: 全民族抗战爆发后，红军主力改编为八路军，南方八省红军游击队改编为新四军（琼崖红军游击队除外）。
translations.en: After the full-scale War of Resistance broke out, the main forces of the Red Army were reorganized into the Eighth Route Army, while the Red Army guerrilla units in eight southern provinces were reorganized into the New Fourth Army (with the exception of the Qiongya Red Army Guerrilla Force).

translations.zh: 正面战场国民党军队顽强抗击日军进攻，中国共产党领导的人民抗日武装向敌后实施战略展开，开辟敌后战场。
translations.en: On the center stage battlefield, Kuomintang troops put up tenacious resistance against Japanese invasion.

translations.zh: 敌后战场和正面战场的形成，在战略上对侵华日军造成夹击态势，打乱了日本迅速灭亡中国的计划。
translations.en: Meanwhile, under the leadership of the Communist Party of China, the people's armed forces launched strategic operations behind enemy lines, opening up the backstage battlefield.The establishment of both the center stage and backstage battlefields created a pincer situation against the invading Japanese forces at the strategic level, disrupting Japan's plan to annex China rapidly

translations.zh: 1938年，新四军第1、第2支队挺进苏皖地区，开辟苏南抗日根据地。
translations.en: In 1938, the first and second detachments of the New Fourth Army advanced into the Jiangsu-Anhui region, establishing the Southern Jiangsu Resistance Base.

translations.zh: 1938年2月上旬，新四军军部命令江南各游击队到皖南歙县岩寺集结整编。
translations.en: In early February 1938, the Headquarters of the New Fourth Army ordered Guerrilla Forces from southern Jiangnan to assemble and reorganize in Yansi, Shexian, Southern Anhui.

translations.zh: 图为在岩寺集结的新四军部队。
translations.en: The photo shows New Fourth Army troops assembling in Yansi.

translations.zh: 图为新四军第1支队司令员陈毅（右）和第2支队副司令员粟裕（左）。
translations.en: The photo shows Chen Yi (right), Chief Department Officer of the First Detachment, and Su Yu (left), Deputy Department Officer of the Second Detachment.

translations.zh: 1938年4月，新四军以第1、第2、第3支队部分干部和侦察分队组成先遣支队，在粟裕率领下，向苏南敌后挺进。
translations.en: In April 1938, the New Fourth Army formed the vanguard detachment with parts of the cadres and reconnaissance units from the first, second, and third detachments, and advanced under the leadership of Su Yu to the backstage battlefield in Southern Jiangsu.

translations.zh: 5月，第4支队在安徽巢县东南的蒋家河口伏击日军，取得胜利。
translations.en: In May 1938, the Fourth Detachment of the New Fourth Army won the battle of ambush against Japanese troops at Jiangjiahekou in southeastern Chaoxian County, Anhui Province.

translations.zh: 八路军第115师和第120师各一部创建晋察冀抗日根据地。
translations.en: The 115th Division and the 120th Division of the Eighth Route Army each sent a unit to establish the Shanxi-Chahar-Hebei Resistance Base.

translations.zh: 1937年11月7日，八路军晋察冀军区成立，聂荣臻任司令员兼政治委员。
translations.en: On November 7,1937, the Shanxi-Chahar-Hebei Military Region was established, with Nie Rongzhen serving as the Commander and Political Commissar.

translations.zh: 图为聂荣臻亲临前线指挥作战。
translations.en: The image shows Nie Rongzhen personally commanding battles at the front line.

translations.zh: 1937年秋，八路军第115师独立团穿越插箭岭向河北涞源县挺进。
translations.en: In the autumn of 1937, the 115th Division Independent Regiment of the Eighth Route Army advanced towards Laiyuan County, Hebei Province.

translations.zh: 1937年11月18日，八路军晋察冀军区机关从山西五台县迁至河北阜平县。
translations.en: On November 18, 1937, the Shanxi-Chahar-Hebei Military Region's headquarters was relocated from Wutai County, Shanxi Province, to Fuping County, Hebei Province.

translations.zh: 图为河北阜平县群众欢迎八路军。
translations.en: The picture shows the people of Fuping County welcoming the Eighth Route Army.

translations.zh: 1937年11月4日，八路军第115师主力于山西广阳地区设伏，毙伤日军近千人。
translations.en: On November 4, 1937, the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army ambushed and inflicted nearly a thousand casualties on the Japanese forces in Guangyang, Shanxi Province.
